name: 2019 Asia Symposium on Image Processing ASIP in Singapore
content: Conference official website：http://www.asip.net Meeting time：August 16-18, 2019\. Meeting place：Singapore/Nanyang Executive Centre in Nanyang Technological University. Host unit：ACM Singapore Chapter. keynote speaker： Prof. Xudong Jiang Nanyang Technological University, Singapore Prof. Maode Ma Nanyang Technological University, Singapore Published by： Accepted papers will be published into International Conference Proceedings, which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Inspec etc. Call for Papers： 3D images and models. Color and texture. Compression methods. Emerging display technologies. Evaluation of image and video retrieval systems. Multimodal display systems. Multimodal human computer interaction. Retrieval from multimodal lifelogs. Image compression, coding, and encryption. Image data structures for computer graphics. Image feature extraction. Machine learning technologies for vision. Virtual environments. Virtual humans and artificial life. Important Dates Deadline (full text) : July 01, 2019\. Conference Contact :Mr. Cheney Zhu mailbox: asip@acm-sg.org Tel: +86-021-59561560
topics: computer graphics, animation, virtual reality & gaming
